site.title: Yet another open source forum using Golang - Routinost
site.description: Routinost is a 100% open source, discourse-like forum written in Go. For demo, please visit https://satellity.org. For feedback, you can submit issues or join our slack(https://bit.ly/2IV6LCW), Let's learn Go together!
site.features: Routinost is PRE-ALPHA now! Please be careful when you decide to use it!

topic.rules:
• To be a kind human, keep goodwill towards others
  • It's a good habits to preview before posting.
  • Welcome to share. Enjoy!

comment.custom: You need login before you can leave a comment!

home.forum: Forum is public, you can share your thoughts with the world.

aside.rules:
• Open Source on Github.
  • Based on Golang, React and PostgreSQL.
  • Model tested.
  • Project Roadmap.

errors.10002: The request data has invalid field.
errors.10011: Email or Username is not exist.

cartoon.avatar.head.title: Free Online Cartoon Avatar Maker
cartoon.avatar.head.description: Make your own free cartoon avatar online, a free online avatar generator for anyone to make their beautiful personal avatar easily!

page.title: Free Cartoon Avatar Maker
page.subtitle: A playful Avatar Generator, Create Avatar For Free!

description.title: How to make your own avatar?
description.body: Making an avatar is very simple, just click the different parts, like hair, accessory, beard, etc to switch the selection, and then click the favorite style. You can see the result on the right (or above) immediately. Also You can click the download button to get your avatar. Enjoy it! Any questions, feedbacks are appreciated, feel free to submit in the forum.
description.thanks: Special Thanks: avatar is designed by Pablo Stanley, and npm is developed by Fang-Pen Lin.
